8.魔法の迷宮の祭壇に ささげることで\n強敵に挑むことができる ボスコインやメダル:
This shop sells boss coins and medals, which can be offered
in the Magic Maze to challenge powerful foes. Many of these
foes will drop accessories.

389.達人のオーブのことは 達人に聞くとよいでしょう。\n「達人クエスト」を達成するこ:
Speak with a Master to learn more about the Master Orb.
By completing Master Quests, you can earn jewels that
can be appraised, which in turn unlock powerful
abilities. For some reason, Masters all like to be found
near train stations.

581.住宅村は 自分の家を建てられる 専用地域です。\n「家具屋」「庭具屋」「建物屋」:
The Residential Villages are areas where you can build your
own home. There are housing-related shops here, such as
indoor and outdoor furniture shops, and more. Build
and decorate house that screams "you"!

756.同じアクセサリーを合成して 合成効果をつけたり \n上位のアクセサリーを強化する:
You can synthesize duplicate accessories together to add
additional synthesis effects, as well as enhance higher-
level accessories with accessory inheritance. Hold your Gold
close, because Renee is coming for it!

851.アクセサリーの破片から 元のアクセサリーを\n復元することができます。 復元チャ:
Accessories can be restored via accessory shards.
Give it a try...

921.いらなくなったアクセサリーを アクセサリーの破片に\n交換できます。:
Accessories that you no longer need can be broken down
and exchanged for accessory shards.

970.装備品の錬金効果を 強化できるお店です。\n「強化段階」が 一定の段階になるまで:
Here, you can enhance the alchemy effects of your equipment.
These effects can be upgraded to a certain level.

1056.今までに行ったことがある 町や いざないの石碑の近くまで\nバシっ娘が 飛ばして:
Bazoom Girls can warp you to any town or Zoomethyst
location you've been to before.
"To anywhere in the world, you shall go!"

1148.あなたが 自分のドルボードを手に入れるまで\nドルボードを 無料でレンタルできま:
Until you're able to get your own, you can rent a Dolboard
here to try it out and see what it's like.

1250.ドルボードプリズムをわたすと\nドルボードの新しい見た目を 選べるようになります:
You can hand over Dolboard Prisms you obtain here to
unlock new Dolboard appearances, as well as choose the
appearance you'd like use. You can also dye them!

1330.玩具屋に ついてクンカプセルを わたすと\n新しい ついてクンを 選べるようにな:
Give any pet toy capsules you find to the Toy Shop to obtain
new Pets to follow you. The Toy Shop does not sell any pet
toy capsules of its own.

1438.あやしげな姿をした 謎の商人です。 もう手に入らない\n貴重な装備品や トロフィ:
A mysterious merchant with an even more mysterious appearance.
He'll sell you valuable equipment and trophies that are no longer
obtainable. However, these items can only be purchased if you've
already owned them before.

1557.美容院サロン・フェリシアでは 髪型やヘアカラーなど\n髪やお顔まわりのほか お肌:
At the Beauty Salon Felicia, we can help update your look with
new haircuts, hair coloring, and more. We look forward to
seeing you, and helping you to become a more beautiful...
well, you!

1676.防具や 一部のアクセサリーといった装備品の\nカラーとツヤを 変更できるお店です:
You can change the color and glossiness of equipment and
some accessories here. Let your creativity shine with the
combinations of colors that you come up with!

1781.魔法の仕立て術により 装備品の性能は そのままに\n見た目だけを他の装備に仕立て:
Using the art of magic tailoring, equipment can have its
appearance changed while keeping its stats intact. Please note
that the equipment used to dress up will be consumed, so be
sure to check its effects beforehand.

1941.装備の性能はそのまま 見た目だけを\n他にはない超絶クールな姿に 変えることがで:
You can rent some super-cool costumes that won't affect your
equipment's stats. If you feel like standing out, definitely give
this place a look.

2039.一時的に 別の種族の姿になる 仮装メイク術や\n性別を変える術を かけてくれる不:
A mysterious cosmetician who can temporarily change
your race or permanently change your gender. Enjoy your
new look!

2150.魔法のコスメ屋では 人間の姿のときに\n体の大きさを選んで 変身できます。\nワ:
Here, you can choose to change the size of your human body
from adult to child (and vice versa.) How wonderful!
Just ask if you're feeling the need for a makeover!

2251.ダーマの神を祀っている 職業に深く関わる神殿です。\nマスタースキルポイントの取:
A temple dedicated to the Allmighty Alltrades that is closely
related to vocations. Master Skill Points can be obtained and new
skills can be learned here. You can also reach new heights of
excellence with the Road to Perfection. Furthermore, you could
also receive the blessing of a secret art...?

2420.娯楽島ラッカランのオーナーである 「島主ゴーレック」が\n「ちいさなメダル」と:
Golek, the owner of Luckland, will exchange various items for
your Mini Medals. In addition, Captain Werner will award you
with Mini Medals whenever you defeat a certain number of
the same monster.

2577.手に入れたことのある 「かさ」や「職業の証」に変身できる\nまとめアイテムを タ:
You can obtain special items here that will consolidate any
umbrellas or vocation proofs that you've obtained before
from Ms. Tabane. If you're carrying a lot of these kinds of
items, it's a good idea to get these!

2738.ガニャポンを回すために必要な ニャンコインを交換したり\n不要なカプセルを 引き:
You can exchange for Cat Coins needed for the Catshapon
machine and have any unwanted capsules taken off your
hands. What kind of cat capsules will you get?

2836.あなたの<kyodai_rel3>の見た目や名前\nさらに衣装を変更することがで:
A mysterious mirror that allows you to change your <kyodai_rel3>'s
name, appearance, and even their outfit. Help <kyodai>
to look as snazzy as they can!

2941.更衣室は かんたんに水着に 着替えられる場所です。\n泳ぐためには 水着を 着な:
The changing room allows you to easily change into a swimsuit,
which is required for swimming. If you don't have a swimsuit,
you can get one at the Swimsuit Shop.

3081.おいのりしたり いきかえらせたり 生きとし生ける者に\n神のご加護を 分け与えて:
A holy place where you can pray, resurrect, and share
blessings. You can also register destinations for your
Zoomstones here.

3189.疲れた旅人を あたたかく出迎えてくれる 旅人の宿です。\n冒険でＨＰやＭＰがへっ:
An inn for travelers that warmly welcomes the weary. Rest
here to quickly recover your HP and MP. If you've accrued
enough Fame Points, your Fame Level will increase.

3323.アイテムやゴールドを 預けたり引き出すことができます。\nフィールドのバトルでチ:
A place to safely store your Gold and items. If you fall in
battle, you'll lose a portion of your carried Gold, so it's
a good idea to store any Gold here that you might be afraid
of losing.

3456.郵便局では 手紙や アイテムを受け取ったり\nフレンドに送ったりできます。\n旅:
At post offices, you can send and receive mail. Mail can be
sent to your friends and teammates. You can also collect
any earnings from the Traveler's Bazaar here. If you want
to send a letter, you'll need stationery, which you can buy
at any Stationery Shop.

3600.冒険に必要な 様々な道具を 売り買いできるお店です。:
You can buy and sell various items you'll surely use on your
adventure.

3640.いろいろな種類の武器を販売しています。\n盾も買うことができます。:
Various types of weapons and shields are available for
sale here.

3688.身体の各部位に装備できる 防具を扱っています。: Various types of armor can be purchased here.

3723.職人の生産や 錬金に使える素材を 買うことができます。\nまた 「使い込み度」が:
Crafters can purchase materials here that are used in
production and alchemy. You can also extract Sweat & Tears Gems
from equipment that has reached a certain usage rate.

3834.生産や錬金に必要な 「レシピ帳」を販売しています。\nレシピ帳をつかって レシピ:
Recipe Books are sold here that are necessary for both
production crafts and alchemy. Using Recipe Books will
expand your crafting repertoire.

3941.旅人の空腹を満たす いろいろな料理のお店です。\n料理は 食べると様々な効果が発:
Restaurants sell various cuisines that are sure to satisfy
even the most rugged of adventurers. Eating food
can confer a variety of temporary effects.

4015.駅から鉄道に乗ることで 別の大陸に移動できます。\nただし 鉄道を利用するために:
Stations allow you travel between continents. However, an
Intercontinental Rail Pass is required to use the train.

4104.五大陸の駅の構内に 店舗があり 期間限定の\n「アストルティア★ハッピーくじ」を:
Each station in the towns and cities of the five continents sell
tickets for the limited time Astoltia Happy Lottery. Once the results
have been announced, you can receive your prizes here! Dream big and
win even bigger!

4247.冒険者たちが 仲間を求めて集まる\n出会いと別れの場所です。「サポートなかま」を:
A place where adventurers gather for meeting and parting with
companions. Here you can hire support party members or
register yourself as one for other players to use. You can
also change vocations by speaking to the priest.

4389.「魔物管理人」を通じて 仲間モンスターに関する\nいろいろな機能が利用できます。:
Through Monster Managers here, you can use various functions
related to fellow monsters. You can also purchase scouting
books here that are necessary to scout new monsters.

4508.旅人バザーでは 取引商を介して 冒険者同士で\nアイテムの売り買いができます。\:
At the Traveler's Bazaar, adventurers can buy and sell
items. If you see something you want, buy it!
You can also list items of your own to sell.

4630.アイテムを渡すことで 別のアイテムと 交換できます。\nアストルティアには 多く:
Exchange shops allow you to exchange for a variety of items.
Each shop will have its own type of currency required to
exchange.

4757.町の外にいることがある 行商人に運賃を払うと\n選んだ場所まで 馬車で運んでもら:
Traveling merchants are sometimes found outside of towns near
their entrances. By paying a nominal fee, they will take you to
a location of your choice. However, there are only a few
places they can take you, and they only go one way.

4856.遠く離れた場所に 一瞬で移動できる\n魔法の仕掛けです。町の中にも配置されている:
A magical portal that takes you to faraway places in an
instant. They're also conveniently placed around towns,
so be sure to use them to get around quickly.

4948.地下へと つながる 井戸の入口です。\nいろいろなものが得られたり 人との出会い:
Wells are placed all over and allow you to go underground.
You might find new items, meet new people, or even start
a new adventure! If you see one, it's "well" worth
checking out!

5079.冒険に役立つ サービスが受けられる 旅の案内所です。\n元気チャージの交換や 支:
A travel information center that offers services useful to any
adventurer. You can exchange your Energy Charge hours
and receive Gold and various types of tickets. You might
even get special items if you play the lottery!

5225.冒険の基礎や ヒントになる知識を\nクイズ形式で学ぶことができます。\n「キーエ:
Here you can learn the basics of adventuring in the form of
several quizzes. When you have at least one Key Emblem,
try talking to an Adventurer Seminar member. Passing
these quizzes will give you some nice rewards!

5417.染色用の素材 カラフルブーケ ツヤめきペイント: Dyeing Materials, Colorful Bouquets, Glossy Paint

5583.アストルティア放送局について くわしく教えてくれる\nテレビ番組が大好きな局員で:
A lover of TV who'll tell you all about the Astoltia Broadcast
Station. Feel free to ask him with any questions you have.
He's waiting at the observatory with a wonderful view.

5766.あなたの持っている錬金釜の 色を変えたり\nフォルムチェンジができる お店です。:
You can change the form and color of your Alchemy Pot
here. Just what will you cook up?!

5850.占い師のための モンスタータロットを 買うことできます。\nいろいろなカードを手:
Here you can buy packs of Monster Tarot cards. Try to collect
a variety of cards and build the ultimate deck.

5946.「チーム」についての各種手続きをしてくれます。\nチームとは 冒険者たちが結成す:
These individuals will handle all procedures relating to Teams.
Teams are groups of like-minded adventurers, and you'll
become a member of the country you register in. After forming
a Team, you will have access to Team Vendors and Team
Quests.

6115.公式サイト『目覚めし冒険者の広場』内の ＤＱＸショップで\n購入できるアイテムを:
This is a shop where you can exchange Shop Points and Premium
Gold at the DQX Shop that is also featured on the official website.
There's a wide variety of stylish equipment and convenient
items to choose from, so be sure to check it out!

6304.たくさんの機能をもつ 大型の居住エリアである\n「マイタウン」について教えてくれ:
These individuals will tell you all about My Towns, which are
large housing areas with many functions. So, how about it?
Doesn't having a dream town of your own sound nice?

6478.『継続特典』を 受け取ることができます。\n同一の『冒険の書』内の キャラクター:
Here you can receive benefits from how long you've been
subscribed to the game. For other characters on the same
account, you can exchange Present Tickets for the
subscription benefits you've already redeemed.

6656.クエストスキップは まだ 一度もクリアしていない クエストを\nクリアしたことに:
Quest Skip is a feature that allows you to clear quests
that you've yet to complete. You will need Premium
Gold in order to use this service.

6792.帽子伝道師は 冒険者の成長を助ける 「エンゼルスライム帽」を\n一度だけ 無料で:
Hat Preachers will give you one free Angel Slime Hat that
greatly boosts experience gained, helpful for any adventurer!
You can also exchange the Angel Hearts you find for various items.
They got your back! ...Or head, I suppose.

6943.マイタウンの説明だけでなく マイタウンへの移動\nまた 購入もできる マイタウン:
This is the general reception relating to My Towns, where you
can not only learn about them, but travel to and even purchase
one (if you can!) too. To purchase this prized plot of land, you
will need a hefty amount of Gold or a Sealed My Town Deed.

7121.マイタウン権利証・封書 マイタウンメダル: Sealed My Town Deed, My Town Medals

7163.スキップの神殿では 「おはなし」を バージョン７\n『未来への扉とまどろみの少女:
In the Skipper's Shrine, you'll be able to deem clear the main
story up to the beginning of Version 7. Be warned, though, as
you will not be able to replay any story that you skip past.
